title: Virginia governors race previews 2022 messaging war
description: Chuck talks with OnMessage Co-Founder Brad Todd and President of Brilliant Corners Research and Strategies Cornell Belcher about competing messages heading into 2022.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
